about_the_game:
Sometime in the near past, a kid gets an ominous television transmission.
He has intercepted a cryptic message - and the Deathchron arrives at his house.
He is transported to an alternate future world, where robotic mechs have taken over,
and he has one chance to save the world. A.R.T. - his own automated robot transporter is
here to help, but it's much more than that. A.R.T. can be upgraded to shoot various weapons!

So, take a nostalgic trip back to 1987 when games were hard and they didn't make sense.
Deathchron is an NES style game inspired by titles such as Blaster Master.

Features:
8 bit style NES artwork
Action Platforming
Upgrades for your mech
Various areas to explore
Bosses that will eat you alive

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 Home Edition (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3 or better
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 720
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated DirectX 9 compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 Pro Edition (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel i7 or better
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated DirectX 9 compatible sound card

short_description: Deathchron is an action side scroller where you play as a kid that finds an amazing mech to save the world.
